post:
Bacloud.com - Data center operator since 2005


We use enterprise hardware ( rack server boards, 100% enterprice SSD, RAM, network equipents, UPS/diesel generators ) only!

With every hosting: Daily backups, Select PHP version, Multi domains, Free software with one click install.

Web hosting plans:

Personal: 10GB disk space 100% SSD, 50GB bandwidth, 1 database, From €18.00 / year ( €1.5/mo )
Business: 30GB disk space 100% SSD, Unlimited bandwidth, 5 databases, From €10.24 / 3 Months ( €3.41/mo )
Professional: 50GB disk space 100% SSD, Unlimited bandwidth, 10 databases, Dedicated IP address, From €14.63 / 3 Months ( €4.87/mo )
Ultimate: 100GB disk space 100% SSD, Unlimited bandwidth, Unlimited databases, Dedicated IP address, From €10.00 / Monthly
